The staff was also very friendly and attentive to their guests needs.The shuttle service was great - it ran every half hour from early morning till noon and in the afternoon and evening it was only a phonecall away.

review.title: Excellent service - but tooooo warm
review.reviewText: Like some of the reviewers, I was disappointed with the room temperature. No matter how I tried to change the termostat - whether hot or cold -- the fan always blew hot air, which made the room very stuffy. During daylight hours the door could be kept open, but that was not realistic at night. The overall satisfaction relates to the very good service, outstanding employee attitudes, and one of the best free "continental" breakfasts I have ever had -- including make your own (NOT microwave) waffles.

review.title: not impressed
review.reviewText: room was stuffy and warm. could not control with room controls.

review.title: Great view
review.reviewText: Great views of the bay

review.title: Good value for the money
review.reviewText: This is a no frills hotel but the room was clean, the staff was friendly, there was a walking path along the coast line, and there was a nice restaurant next door. The only downside was the sound from the airport - but that's the price you pay to avoid the traffic from the city.

review.title: Value for money
review.reviewText: If you are in transit at SFO this is a very good deal. Room is comfortable. You get complimentary b'fast, boradband and airport shuttle. A walk behind the hotel with a nice view of the bay and the airport is also a plus.

review.title: More than expected
review.reviewText: Both my wife and I were impressed with the quality of service, the excellent breakfast (not the usual continental) almost a mini buffet, as well as the two complimentary computers to use in the lobby. Excellent view of the bay and very little disturbance from airport considering proximity to hotel. Great stay at a great price.

review.title: Value for money
review.reviewText: Is satisafactory for the money, being on the foreshore is a great place to go for a walk, unfortunately the room next door had TV running all night which I could hear as well but maybe is should have complained to them

review.title: Comfortable but noisy
review.reviewText: I booked the room because other reviews had raved about it, but I tend to agree with one of the two negative ones a read. It was very noisy. My husband and I had to leave the TV on all night to mask the noise coming from the Elephant Bar parking lot. If you go here, request the Bay side, where the nice view is. The other side is way too noisy. Other than that, the room was adequate and clean, the bed comfortable and it had a microwave and refrigerator, which is nice for long stays.

review.title: Absolutely the best value on SF Bay
review.reviewText: I attended a conference at a nearby hotel which was almost 3 times the cost of the Vagabond, plus they charge daily for parking (being near the airport) while parking at the Vagabond was free for guests. I decided to stay at the Vagabond and walk the 2 blocks to the conference along the walkway that runs along the bay and connects all the properties and restaurants. My room overlooked San Francisco bay and I could watch the planes taking off and landing. The view was great. The room was nicely decorated and I was able to get my laptop working on the first try using the hotel's wireless system. The room had a microwave and fridge. The service was great. Getting a room at a nice hotel like this that overlooked the bay was a highlight of the trip. This was an outstanding value. I am reserving a room here for my next trip to SF in August.

review.title: Great view
review.reviewText: I stayed in one of the rooms with view, and the view was indeed gorgeous. You can hear the seagulls in the morning and watch planes land and take off from SFO. The bed is very comfortable. The only grudges I have with the room was that the bath tub was not as clean as it could've been, and the keycard for my room door failed twice. But besides those, a truly delightful place to relax and enjoy the bay area.

review.title: Honeymoon Stay
review.reviewText: We booked this hotel (close to the airport) prior to leaving for our honeymoon in Italy. The staff was attentive and the room overlooked the bay and a beautiful moon reflected on the water. Definitely a memorable way to start our trip.

review.title: We would recommend this motel to our friends
review.reviewText: The Vagabond is a great place to spend the night before departing S. F. Airport. The staff are friendly and well organized, the rooms are comfortable,and parking is free. There are lots of good restaurants in the immediate area and they have a world class jogging track immediately behind the motel.

review.title: Adequate for staying near the airport
review.reviewText: We stayed on night in order to be close to the airport for our next morning departure. The room was satisfactory although the water pressure was very low. Nice restaurant right next door. Good view of the bay. Reasonably priced.

review.title: convenient but
review.reviewText: We had to wait 1 hour for hotel's shuttle to pick us from SFO. This is a very basic place to stay. I wish I had paid a little more and stayed in a decent hotel in the area. Dedinetely it is not the value for your money.

review.title: Pleasant. Wish we had more time to enjoy.
review.reviewText: Only had a few hours to enjoy the hotel but would definitely recommend it and would return if the occasion arises. Front desk was very pleasant and cooperative.

review.title: Great value for location
review.reviewText: Front desk staff very friendly and accommodating. Breakfast/coffee station well stocked and available. Fresh daily baked cookies nice touch. Adjacency to good restaurants and Bay trail nice bonuses.

review.title: Nice view
review.reviewText: Good view of bay and airport.

review.title: Great deal
review.reviewText: Very good value with helpful staff

review.title: No Major Complaints
review.reviewText: Stayed 1st and last nights of our recent trip. When we arrived we were picking up a car from SFO next morning so used the shuttle bus to and from the airport.Apart from about 1/2 hour wait this wasn't a problem. Check in took a wee while due 2 3 parties arr @ the same time. No worries though, the receptionist was very nice. After a very long flight we just wanted to chill out, I went down to ask about eating options, the receptionist recommended a local chinese and was kind enough to call them to fax a menu. She also rec'd The Elephant Bar next door. After a discussion we decided to try the Elephant! It was very busy but they have a booking system similar to F&B's in the UK with the flashing lights and we were soon shown 2 our table. 2 cut a long story short the food and service was A1 and we couldn't do it justice after a long flight. We went back on our last night and had a FAB meal!!! Back 2 the Hotel, Rooms seem 2 be hit and miss, 1st night was really spacious and clean but no view. Last night was smaller room and cigarette burns on furniture etc. but superb view of Bay. As a stopover I would recommend it!

review.title: Surprised and Impressed
review.reviewText: Really not bad for the price! The room had an incredible view of the water. The breakfast was great, (they have hot waffles) and the staff really very nice. They take good care of this place.

review.title: An excellent bargain
review.reviewText: I was very pleased. The property is clean; service is good; and the complimentary breakfast and internet service were a treat.

review.title: Sucked
review.reviewText: Breakfast selection was the cheapest cereal they could find. Did not keep items available. Always had to ask for food items. Cheap looking rooms. Noisey.

review.title: Nice hotel in a good location
review.reviewText: The Vagabond Inn is a very pleasant place to stay in an excellent location. The room was clean, comfortable and well maintained. I would definitely recommend this place if you need an affordable room near SFO.

review.title: Good For Price
review.reviewText: Hotel is good for the price, Nice front desk service. Free Parking is great and Free Breakfast.

review.title: Relatively clean hotel, but too noisy
review.reviewText: There is like a pub right beside this hotel, so at night u can hear people walking or talking on the streets. If u really need quiet space for your stay, this is not the hotel for you. Otherwise, the service and room cleanliness are okay.

review.title: very confortable
review.reviewText: convenient, clean and affordable.

review.title: Only one thing wrong with this place....
review.reviewText: and that is because of one "unfriendly" front desk clerk. If it wasn't for this guy, my overall satisfaction of this place would have been 5 instead of 4. Other than that, the place is very clean and well maintained. I can put up with a grumpy front desk clerk. Nice place to stay for the price.

review.title: Good, basic accomodations
review.reviewText: Front desk staff not very consistent ranging from very helpful to 'don't care'. Spent 45 minutes waiting for breakfast bar to be replenished. I'm sure this was an anomoly.

review.title: It was adequate
review.reviewText: Front Desk was helpful but not very friendly. When I picked up my car-the clerk didn't care that I was driving it away. Good thing it was mine!

review.title: very impressed
review.reviewText: This was an unexpected treat. We just wanted a place to stay near the airport, we found a really nice place on the bay with close "walk to" places to eat. We were very comfortable.

review.title: unexpected nice view on the lake
review.reviewText: Close to the airport,cheap,shuttlebus and nice view on the lake. Friendly people. Good restaurant nextdoors.

review.title: Extremely noisy, don't plan to sleep in......
review.reviewText: The hotel and room were clean, and the continental breakfast was satisfactory for the price. Most of the staff was professional and corteous. The room was extremely noisy, the external wall is glass. It was like sleeping with the windows wide-open! We could even hear conversations taking place in the parking lot. Try to get a room in the back, then all you have to worry about is the early-morning joggers.

review.title: Good choice for airport hotel
review.reviewText: We had a fantastic view of the bay -- literally a few feet from our window. The staff was also very accommodating in arranging for a taxi for a very early flight, before their shuttle service was in operation.

review.title: Great rooms but poor front desk and maintenance service
review.reviewText: We stayed for 3 nights. Rooms were comfortable and clean. However airconditioning and 2 room lights were not working - we were given the runaround for maintenance service. Front desk were always at a lost when we were trying to get more information on availability

review.title: nice place
review.reviewText: Clean , helpfull deskpeople, friendly neighboorhood (view of bay). Good alternative to hotels in SF if you are looking for cheaper accommodation

review.title: Very good for the price
review.reviewText: Most of the hotels in the area charge for parking and this did not. They were remodeling so there were a few inconveniences.

review.title: A pleasant suprise!
review.reviewText: Great views, path from hotel to water, and location make this this low key hotel a great bargain.
